table.name: vtiger_personalconsent
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_personalconsent` ( `personalconsentid` int(19) NOT NULL, `personalconsentname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `organization` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `contractualconsent` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `contractualconsentdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `internalcommconsent` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `internalcommconsentdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `externalcommunicationconsent` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `externalcommconsentdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `sociocommconsent` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sociocommconsentdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `personaltreatment` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_evaluationcf
